error.model_not_supported: This model is not supported, please select a different model

data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response

data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.reasoning_effort: How many reasoning tokens the model should generate before creating a response to the prompt (for certain reasoning models)
data_description.search_context_size: High level guidance for the amount of context window space to use for the search
data_description.user_location: Refine search results based on geography
data_description.web_search: Allow the model to search the web for the latest information before generating a response

config_entry.description: The config entry to use for this action
config_entry.name: Config entry

prompt.description: The text to turn into an image
prompt.name: Prompt

quality.description: The quality of the image that will be generated
quality.name: Quality

size.description: The size of the image to generate
size.name: Size

style.description: The style of the generated image
style.name: Style
